title: Flying careers with the Navy
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Royal Australian Air Force

Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Air pilots - Training of
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Armed forces - training
description: Illustrates aspects of the training of pilots for the Royal Australian Navy, showing how recruits gain experience handling Tiger Moth, Wirraway, Sea Fury and Fire-Fly types of aircraft. The film records joint Navy and Air Force exercises held off the NSW coast to test Australian defences against possible attack from sea and air.
